name: Seconds to Square
description:
Have you ever been bored on your desktop drawing selection boxes with no real purpose, but found it fun? Seconds to Square is a momentum-based action-platformer that takes this motion and turns it into a time manipulation mechanic!

Drawing boxes in Seconds to Square works exactly like selecting folders on your desktop! Draw a fast box by left clicking to augment your run speed and jump height or draw a slow box by right clicking to dodge projectiles!

The goal of Seconds to Square is to race against the clock as you draw boxes using left and right clicks to speed up or slow down time.
